links.title: Telos Corporation Announces Third Quarter 2024 Earnings
links.content:
[ Skip to main content ](#main)

# Release Details

# 

Telos Corporation Announces Third Quarter 2024 Earnings

November 12, 2024 at 9:01 AM EST

[Download PDF](/node/12286/pdf)

ASHBURN, Va., Nov. 12, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- [Telos Corporation](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=CzV1dXubc7CAxk0YxvUyQ33PQTpU_2yU9Eoisxvdcy7PSdNcQlGEdiMd0vNxYxj36bQPQGy6jMCEMWsADJ4K0g==) (NASDAQ: TLS), a leading provider of cyber, cloud and enterprise security solutions for the world’s most security-conscious organizations, has posted its 2024 third quarter financial results on its investor relations website at [https://investors.telos.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=5OOmmGQt__gfqmVcFO1iBqAdCy60bBUuhwvgCmhaHAS__f9e-Xo8KWrA745nuNzEkjNVL1BBTGGDjc6WG7E1pDYvlI88YcUppZWnEK7It6s=).

Telos will host a live webcast to discuss its third quarter 2024 financial results today, November 12, 2024, at 10:30 a.m. EST. To access the webcast, visit [https://register.vevent.com/register/BIdfd71e0c66a04ad886e4545430153f2b](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=5OOmmGQt__gfqmVcFO1iBgxAXuTV4wTONQK3vKeUiHZnl9LPGQFZ7hmZNJFZ6UYUnDVcqWfbNEWckcpeBaOfTCFeecUuktpK-LzQcMtbEXxNeB92sbm8M37v4w24Q2AGUy5I-V_wkfQRf0JlxukmOYhg4drcVqN2vFgTrOBbJnieppQO7msdA2LJ26DoeLM2coSXtT6-qWrX0aHEm-W4vfdUwZI_LYUtPCGZ5pBa7Cw=).

Related presentation materials will be made available on the Investors section of the Company’s website at [https://investors.telos.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=5OOmmGQt__gfqmVcFO1iBqAdCy60bBUuhwvgCmhaHASLOZT-SVFYyqdkFjs2Ep3O-Ss1xGsLRCn_dcLZ2BaEjnThKI3nmOBcVf2Tayl62QE=). In addition, an archived webcast will be available approximately two hours after the conclusion of the live event on the Investors section of the Company’s website. 

**About Telos Corporation**[Telos Corporation](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=CzV1dXubc7CAxk0YxvUyQzc0HqCwkCvzuTHRQX3fq5WQfAAuXRtnoKHrBZ0g0Jj0Oy1hXoxVCLb4y8DIpIJNTw==) (NASDAQ: TLS) empowers and protects the world’s most security-conscious organizations with solutions for continuous security assurance of individuals, systems, and information. Telos’ offerings include cybersecurity solutions for IT risk management and information security; cloud security solutions to protect cloud-based assets and enable continuous compliance with industry and government security standards; and enterprise security solutions for identity and access management, secure mobility, organizational messaging, and network management and defense. The company serves commercial enterprises, regulated industries and government customers around the world. 

**Media:**[media@telos.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=JHnwzpY7d9pgW_NJ-SbLwbFD36pJAMFWJ7k-0ry-fO3JsQbIGSMRwZuMEwbTzsAqk4Tbk-QroLtkbs6l7Y8Nwg==) **Investors:**[InvestorRelations@telos.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=aUMiMpH4aegc9zLGF0nep80gZxJms-S5hxhGyB1g7Q8WugaCUqDsd5OoWr6XoCozPBD-6bhNr8T4PspD1JPB0wECmIQS_3ln8EwunrqM16-__ZJgTFevd_wXIuAYFYlu)

![](https://www.globenewswire.com/newsroom/ti?nf=OTI3MjA0MiM2NTc2NjczIzIxMjU1NTg=)![](https://ml.globenewswire.com/media/MDgwYzYzNDktYzliNC00Mjc1LTg2NWMtZWJlM2VmNjBhYWNjLTExMzcxMjk=/tiny/Telos-Corporation.png)

[![Primary Logo](https://ml.globenewswire.com/media/9035d484-18b8-4406-85df-b2a5e5a1ff53/small/telos2010-2c-web-jpg.jpg)](https://www.globenewswire.com/NewsRoom/AttachmentNg/9035d484-18b8-4406-85df-b2a5e5a1ff53)

Source: Telos Corporation

links.title: Telos Corporation Announces Third Quarter 2024 Earnings
links.content:
[ Skip to main content ](#main)

# Release Details

# 

Telos Corporation Announces Third Quarter 2024 Earnings

November 12, 2024 at 9:01 AM EST

[Download PDF](/node/12286/pdf)

ASHBURN, Va., Nov. 12, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- [Telos Corporation](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=CzV1dXubc7CAxk0YxvUyQ33PQTpU_2yU9Eoisxvdcy7PSdNcQlGEdiMd0vNxYxj36bQPQGy6jMCEMWsADJ4K0g==) (NASDAQ: TLS), a leading provider of cyber, cloud and enterprise security solutions for the world’s most security-conscious organizations, has posted its 2024 third quarter financial results on its investor relations website at [https://investors.telos.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=5OOmmGQt__gfqmVcFO1iBqAdCy60bBUuhwvgCmhaHAS__f9e-Xo8KWrA745nuNzEkjNVL1BBTGGDjc6WG7E1pDYvlI88YcUppZWnEK7It6s=).

Telos will host a live webcast to discuss its third quarter 2024 financial results today, November 12, 2024, at 10:30 a.m. EST. To access the webcast, visit [https://register.vevent.com/register/BIdfd71e0c66a04ad886e4545430153f2b](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=5OOmmGQt__gfqmVcFO1iBgxAXuTV4wTONQK3vKeUiHZnl9LPGQFZ7hmZNJFZ6UYUnDVcqWfbNEWckcpeBaOfTCFeecUuktpK-LzQcMtbEXxNeB92sbm8M37v4w24Q2AGUy5I-V_wkfQRf0JlxukmOYhg4drcVqN2vFgTrOBbJnieppQO7msdA2LJ26DoeLM2coSXtT6-qWrX0aHEm-W4vfdUwZI_LYUtPCGZ5pBa7Cw=).

Related presentation materials will be made available on the Investors section of the Company’s website at [https://investors.telos.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=5OOmmGQt__gfqmVcFO1iBqAdCy60bBUuhwvgCmhaHASLOZT-SVFYyqdkFjs2Ep3O-Ss1xGsLRCn_dcLZ2BaEjnThKI3nmOBcVf2Tayl62QE=). In addition, an archived webcast will be available approximately two hours after the conclusion of the live event on the Investors section of the Company’s website. 

**About Telos Corporation**[Telos Corporation](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=CzV1dXubc7CAxk0YxvUyQzc0HqCwkCvzuTHRQX3fq5WQfAAuXRtnoKHrBZ0g0Jj0Oy1hXoxVCLb4y8DIpIJNTw==) (NASDAQ: TLS) empowers and protects the world’s most security-conscious organizations with solutions for continuous security assurance of individuals, systems, and information. Telos’ offerings include cybersecurity solutions for IT risk management and information security; cloud security solutions to protect cloud-based assets and enable continuous compliance with industry and government security standards; and enterprise security solutions for identity and access management, secure mobility, organizational messaging, and network management and defense. The company serves commercial enterprises, regulated industries and government customers around the world. 

**Media:**[media@telos.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=JHnwzpY7d9pgW_NJ-SbLwbFD36pJAMFWJ7k-0ry-fO3JsQbIGSMRwZuMEwbTzsAqk4Tbk-QroLtkbs6l7Y8Nwg==) **Investors:**[InvestorRelations@telos.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=aUMiMpH4aegc9zLGF0nep80gZxJms-S5hxhGyB1g7Q8WugaCUqDsd5OoWr6XoCozPBD-6bhNr8T4PspD1JPB0wECmIQS_3ln8EwunrqM16-__ZJgTFevd_wXIuAYFYlu)

![](https://www.globenewswire.com/newsroom/ti?nf=OTI3MjA0MiM2NTc2NjczIzIxMjU1NTg=)![](https://ml.globenewswire.com/media/MDgwYzYzNDktYzliNC00Mjc1LTg2NWMtZWJlM2VmNjBhYWNjLTExMzcxMjk=/tiny/Telos-Corporation.png)

[![Primary Logo](https://ml.globenewswire.com/media/9035d484-18b8-4406-85df-b2a5e5a1ff53/small/telos2010-2c-web-jpg.jpg)](https://www.globenewswire.com/NewsRoom/AttachmentNg/9035d484-18b8-4406-85df-b2a5e5a1ff53)

links.title: Telos Corporation to Participate in Upcoming Investor Conferences
links.content:
[ Skip to main content ](#main)

# Release Details

# 

Telos Corporation to Participate in Upcoming Investor Conferences

November 8, 2024 at 8:29 AM EST

[Download PDF](/node/12251/pdf)

ASHBURN, Va., Nov. 08, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Telos Corporation (NASDAQ: TLS), a leading provider of cyber, cloud and enterprise security solutions for the world’s most security-conscious organizations, today announced that John B. Wood, chairman and chief executive officer, and Mark Bendza, executive vice president and chief financial officer, will host investor meetings at the following investor conferences:

**18th Annual Needham Virtual Security, Networking and Communications Conference**Date: November 19, 2024

**Northland Virtual Growth Conference** Date: December 12, 2024

**About Telos Corporation**[Telos Corporation](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=fP8ieL4vZkdIP9cGjWmZSSgUQEowpIxDUU4k2R7m5OLmh6EDQ5Phkw-sIKypfobayYE8-cEMAO8PthKkcU-i8Q==) (NASDAQ: TLS) empowers and protects the world’s most security-conscious organizations with solutions for continuous security assurance of individuals, systems, and information. Telos’ offerings include cybersecurity solutions for IT risk management and information security; cloud security solutions to protect cloud-based assets and enable continuous compliance with industry and government security standards; and enterprise security solutions for identity and access management, secure mobility, organizational messaging, and network management and defense. The Company serves commercial enterprises, regulated industries and government customers around the world.

**Media:**[media@telos.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=jeJgb__P7OE6nxKThhcuvDSgKaD0Jr_yYHVyPBNIazJ8y0cCGds8j64FUARTZXHBiCkK9Pj5OqYEthDqvs5XaQ==)

**Investors:**[InvestorRelations@telos.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=sbktvgjua-gZJS3QbeZ9DbhUkMxiUYa4dCS5q4po-MV33l-fCSv4Zd-q8Ww6IB4xxoRDxxFtSMVos24q8uc5D0_ffwY1dUptXfRHOKXIhrgU_FSAORiSBuymBX-iIvcK)

![](https://www.globenewswire.com/newsroom/ti?nf=OTI3MDIzMyM2NTcyOTU0IzIxMjU1NTg=)![](https://ml.globenewswire.com/media/ZTY0MTA2NGYtNzQ5Zi00MGVjLTllYjYtYzg3OGJhNzI0OTkyLTExMzcxMjk=/tiny/Telos-Corporation.png)

[![Primary Logo](https://ml.globenewswire.com/media/9035d484-18b8-4406-85df-b2a5e5a1ff53/small/telos2010-2c-web-jpg.jpg)](https://www.globenewswire.com/NewsRoom/AttachmentNg/9035d484-18b8-4406-85df-b2a5e5a1ff53)
